text: Styrax vilcabambae (syn. Pamphilia vilcabambae D.R.Simpson) is a species of flowering plant in the genus Styrax and the family Styracaceae. It is endemic to Peru.Wallnöfer, B. (1997). A revision of Styrax L. section Pamphilia (Mart. ex A. DC.) B. Walln. (Styracaceae). Ann. Nathist. Mus. Wien 99B: 681–720.World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998: Pamphilia vilcabambae ==References== vilcabambae Category:Endemic flora of Peru Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Styrax vilcabambae
